		}

		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"OnCreated"
				{

					{

					}
				}

			}

		{
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Ability.PowershotPull"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_obsidian_destroyer/obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse_damage.vpcf"

			}

			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/moon_ranger/split_shot.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_channel"
			}

		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/moon_ranger/split_shot.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_splitshot"
				"damage"		"%damage"
				"range"			"%range"
			}
		}
		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}
		"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
			"DeleteOnHit"	"0"

			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/moon_ranger/split_shot.lua"
				"Function"		"arrow_strike"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"IsHidden"	"1"
						"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_obsidian_destroyer/obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse_damage.vpcf"

						"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/moon_ranger/ranger_aoe_explosion.lua"
						"Function"		"starfall_initiate"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_starfall"
			{
				"OnCreated"
				{
	            	"FireEffect"
	            	{
	            		"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_mirana/mirana_starfall_attack.vpcf"
	            		"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
	            		"Target"		"TARGET"
	            	}
				}
			}

		}

		{

			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/pyroblast.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_pyro"
				"range"			"%range"
			}			
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Jakiro.LiquidFire"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}

		}

		"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
			"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
			"AttachEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_warlock/warlock_rain_of_chaos.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"EffectRadius"	"%radius"
				"EffectDurationScale"	"1"
				"EffectLifeDurationScale"	"1"
				"EffectColorA"	"255 0 0"
				"EffectColorB"	"255 0 0"
				"Target"	"TARGET"
			}
			"ActOnTargets"
			{
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"	"TARGET"
					"Radius"	"%radius"
					"Teams"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
					"Types"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				}
			
				"Action"    
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_pyroblast_stun"
						"Target" 	"TARGET"
						"Duration"		"%stun_duration"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/pyroblast.lua"

						"target"		"TARGET"
						"radius"		"%radius"
						"damage"		"%damage"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}

			}
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Techies.Suicide"
				"Target" 		"TARGET"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_huskar/huskar_burning_spear_debuff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType" "attach_staff_tip"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"IsHidden"	"1"
						"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_phoenix/phoenix_icarus_dive_char_glow.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
						"Target"	"CASTER"

						"EffectColorB"	"255 0 0"

						{
							"00"	"50 100 5"
						}

					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}

				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/pyroblast.lua"
						"Function"		"channel_end"
					}
				}

			}
			"modifier_pyroblast_stun"
			{
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"OverrideAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"

				}
			}

	"summon_earth_aspect"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"tiny_grow"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"6"  

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"120 250 400 500 600 700"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"aspect_health"				"3000 10000 20000 50000 100000 150000"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"aspect_armor"				"5 20 40 60 90 150"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"aspect_magic_resist"		"80"
			}
		}
		
		// Data driven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"model" "models/items/courier/vaal_the_animated_constructdire/vaal_the_animated_constructdire.vmdl"
			"particle"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_earth_spirit/espirit_bouldersmash_caster.vpcf"
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_earth_spirit.vsndevts"

			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_leshrac/leshrac_split_earth.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/items_fx/brown_lightning.vpcf"
			"particle" 	"particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap_debuff.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/status_fx/status_effect_brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf"
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_brewmaster.vsndevts"
			"particle"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_oracle/oracle_false_promise_heal.vpcf"
			"particle"	"particles/items_fx/earth_guardian.vpcf"
		}

		"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/aspects.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_cast"
			}
		}
		
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/aspects.lua"
				"Function"		"earth_aspect"
				"aspect_health"	"%aspect_health"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_earth_aspect_health"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"

				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_BONUS" "%aspect_health"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%aspect_armor"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS" "%aspect_magic_resist"
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "5.9"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/conjuror_runes.lua"
						"Function"		"earth_aspect_thunder_clap"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_earth_guardian"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
		
				"OnTakeDamage"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/conjuror_runes.lua"
						"Function"		"rune_a_a"
						"damageTaken"	"%attack_damage"
						"Target"		"UNIT"
					}
				}
			}
		}

			}

		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
		"BaseClass"	"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"invoker_sun_strike"
		"AbilityCastRange"	"1000"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"5"
		"AbilityChannelTime"	"1.8"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"	"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE" 
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"6"  
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_earth_ambient.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_dragon_knight/monk_ulti.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/econ/generic/generic_buff_1/monk_ulti_debuff.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_invoker/monk_ultima_tornado.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/frostivus_herofx/juggernaut_omnislash_ascension.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/econ/items/effigies/status_fx_effigies/status_effect_effigy_gold.vpcf" 
		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"juggernaut_jug_ability_omnislash_26"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/juggernaut/ultima_blade.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel_heal"
			}  
		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/juggernaut/ultima_blade.lua"
				"Function"		"start_ultima_heal"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
		}
		"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
			"DeleteOnHit"	"0"
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/juggernaut/ultima_blade.lua"
				"Function"		"projectileHitHeal"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{		
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"					"TARGET"
						"EffectName"				"particles/econ/generic/generic_buff_1/monk_ulti_debuff.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"			"attach_hitloc"
						"EffectLifeDurationScale"	"1"
						"EffectColorA"				"255 255 255"
						"EffectAlphaScale"			"1"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/juggernaut/ultima_blade.lua"
						"Function"		"end_channel"
					}  
				}
			}
			"modifier_monk_ulti_heal"
			{
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"					"TARGET"
						"EffectName"				"particles/econ/generic/generic_buff_1/monk_ulti_debuff.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"			"attach_hitloc"
						"EffectLifeDurationScale"	"1"
						"EffectAlphaScale"			"1"
					}
				}
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT" "80" 
				}
			}
		}

	}

			}

			{
				"var_type"	"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"stun_duration"	"1.0"				
			}


		}

				"Aura_Flags"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
				"Duration"				"8"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_alchemist/fire_ground_effect.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"00" "0 0 0"
							"01" "80 1 1"
							"15" "255 120 120"
							"16" "1 0 0"
						}
					}
				}		
			}
			"modifier_henchman_burn_aura"
			{
				"IsDebuff"		"1"
				"IsPurgable"	"0"
				"ThinkInterval"	"0.5"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"Damage"
					{
						"Target"		"TARGET"
						"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
						"Damage"		"%burn_damage"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"npc_abilities/dungeon_thinker.lua"

					}

	"bone_horror_spew"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"01"

			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"tick_rate"				"0.8"
			}
		}
		
		// Data driven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"npc_abilities/desert_boss_teleport.lua"
				"Function"		"BeginTeleport"
			}

		}
		
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_jonuous_teleport_datadriven"
			{
				"Duration"		"1.5"
				
				"EffectName"		"particles/econ/items/storm_spirit/storm_spirit_orchid_hat/stormspirit_orchid_ball_end.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"

				{					
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"npc_abilities/desert_boss_teleport.lua"
						"Function"			"HideCaster"
					}
				}
				
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"npc_abilities/desert_boss_teleport.lua"
						"Function"			"ShowCaster"
					}
				}
				
				"States"
				{
				
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_MAGIC_IMMUNE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_UNSELECTABLE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_HEALTH_BAR"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"				"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"					"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"modifier_jonuous_phase_shift"
			{
				"States"
				{
				
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"

		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"

			"01"

		{

			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/econ/courier/courier_drodo/courier_drodo_ambient_death_b.vpcf"

			}

			{

			}

			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_hellhound_preparing"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
				"Duration"		"0.9"
			}

		}
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_hellhound_preparing"
            {
                "Passive"            "0"
                "IsHidden"            "1"
                "IsDebuff"            "0"

        		{
	                "RunScript"
	                {
						"ScriptFile"	"ai/hellhound/hellhound_charge.lua"

	                }
        		}

        		{
        			"MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
        			"MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED" 
        		}

                "OnDestroy"
                {
                	"RunScript"
                	{
                		"ScriptFile"	"ai/hellhound/hellhound_charge.lua"
                		"Function"		"begin_charge"
                	}

	                	"ModifierName"	"modifier_hellhound_charging"

	                }
                }

	                }
        		}

                {

                	{

						"Function"		"charge_end"
                	}

			}

		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{

			}

		}

		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_rain_of_fire_channel"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_rain_of_fire_channel"
			}

		}

			}
		}

		"precache"
		{
			"particle" 	"particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap_debuff.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/status_fx/status_effect_brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf"
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_brewmaster.vsndevts"
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Brewmaster.ThunderClap"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			
			"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
				"EffectRadius"		"%radius"
				"Target"            "CASTER"
			}

			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_thunder_clap"
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"	"CASTER"
					"Radius"	"%radius"
					"Teams"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
					"Types"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				}
				"Duration"		"%duration"
			}

			"ActOnTargets"
			{
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"  	"CASTER"
					"Radius" 	"%radius"
					"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
					"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				}
			
				"Action"    
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/conjuror_runes.lua"
						"Function"		"rune_a_b_damage"
						"Target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/conjuror_runes.lua"
				"Function"		"rune_b_a_clap_start"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_thunder_clap"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
		
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_brewmaster/brewmaster_thunder_clap_debuff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
		
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_brewmaster_thunder_clap.vpcf" 	   
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%attack_speed_slow"
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%movement_slow" 
				}

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Brewmaster.ThunderClap.Target"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}			
				}		
			}
		}

	"graveyard_boss_skill"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES"

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0 0 0 0"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"step_distance"				"1000"
			}
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"radius"				"300 350 400 450 500 550"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"duration"				"0.1"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage"				"50 80 120 200 360 520"
			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"tick_rate"				"0.8"
			}
		}
		
		// Data driven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		
		"OnOwnerDied"
		{
			"FireEffect"
			{
				"Target"
				{
					"Center" 	"CASTER"
				}			
				"EffectName"			"particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"		"follow_origin"
				"EffectRadius"			"1000"
				"EffectDurationScale"	"1.1"
				"EffectLifeDurationScale" "1.1"
				"EffectColorA"			"200 200 200"
				"EffectColorB"			"200 200 200"
			}
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_graveyard_boss_blast"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
				"Duration"		"4"
			}
		}
		"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
			"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"ai/graveyard_boss/graveyard_boss_skill"
				"Function"		"hellfire_strike"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_graveyard_boss_blast"
			{
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_battle_hunger.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"ai/graveyard_boss/graveyard_boss_skill"
						"Function"		"start_attack"
					}
				}
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS" "20"
				}
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"

	"gazbin_alchemist_create_trees"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"	
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"sven_storm_bolt"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_ATTACK2"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{

		}
		
		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"2000"
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"

		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"13.0"

		// Damage.
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityDamage"					"100 175 250 325"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"140"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"bolt_speed"			"1000"
			}
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"TrackingProjectile"
			{
				"Target"           	"TARGET"
			    "EffectName"       	"particles/units/heroes/hero_alchemist/alchemist_unstable_concoction_projectile.vpcf"
			    "Dodgeable"        	"0"
			    "ProvidesVision"   	"1"
			    "VisionRadius"		"%vision_radius"

			}

			}

			}
		}
